title: Update Profile Address response
description: Update Profile Address response. Response after customer profile address attributes updated.

shippingAddress.description: The default shipping address to updated if input address marked default shipping address.

contactShippingingAddress.description: The default shipping address to updated if input address marked default shipping address.

contactBillingAddress.description: The default billing address to updated if input address marked default billing address.

addressType.description: The alias of the shipping address.

firstName.description: The first name of the shipping address.

lastName.description: The last name of the shipping address.

address1.description: The address line 1 of the shipping address.

address2.description: The address line 2 of the shipping address.

address3.description: The address line 3 of the shipping address.

city.description: The city of the shipping address.

county.description: The county code of the shipping address.

state.description: The state code of the shipping address.

postalCode.description: The postal Code of the shipping address.

country.description: The country of the shipping address.

phoneNumber.description: The phone Number of the shipping address.

companyName.description: The company name of the shipping address.

123456.shippingAddress: Assign updated address if it's marked as default shipping address
123456.contactShippingAddress: Assign updated address if it's marked as default shipping address
123456.contactBillingAddress: Assign updated address if it's marked as default billing address
